Package com.kabirkanha.sudoku

Class Solver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kabirkanha.sudoku.Solver
  • class Solver
extends java.lang.Object
    This class runs the sudoku solver.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int backtrackCnt
      Stores the total number of backtracks, to report after the solve.
      private javax.swing.JButton btn_edit
      Button to enable edits to the grid.
      private javax.swing.JButton btn_input
      Button to allow file input.
      private javax.swing.JButton btn_lock
      Button to disable edits to the grid; also creates a checkpoint to reset to.
      private javax.swing.JButton btn_new
      Button to start over.
      private javax.swing.JButton btn_reset
      Button to reset the sudoku to the last locked state.
      private javax.swing.JButton btn_solve
      Button to solve the sudoku.
      private javax.swing.JButton btn_verify
      Button to verify a solve.
      private javax.swing.JButton[][] buttons
      2D button array for the sudoku grid.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer>>> cellSets
      This is the heuristic; it stores the remaining possible values for each cell.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer>>> cellSetsChange
      Stores the last printed values of the sets to avoid duplicate printing of the same stage in the console.
      private java.util.Stack<java.lang.Integer> colIds
      Stack to store the column IDs of cells that have been guessed; helpful while backtracking.
      private boolean[][] flag
      2D boolean array to store whether a confirmed cell has updated others or not.
      private int[][] grid
      2D integer array to store the grid data in numeric form.
      (package private) static int gridSize
      Sets the size of one sub-grid.
      private javax.swing.JFrame mainframe
      The main frame that contains the Sudoku grid.
      private java.util.Stack<java.lang.Integer> rowIds
      Stack to store the row IDs of cells that have been guessed; helpful while backtracking.
      (package private) static int size
      Sets the size of the whole grid.

      Sets the font of a JButton.

      Function to solve the Sudoku grid; uses backtracking iff regular constraint propagation techniques are inadequate to find the solution.

      Starts the execution of the solver.

        private int isLast​(int j)
        Checks if a given row/column is the last in any sub-grid on the sudoku grid.
        Parameters:
        j - the row/column index
        Returns:
        the thickness of the border to be used.

        Uses the cells which are already confirmed to update sets of the cells in its row, column and grid.

        private int countFlags()
        Counts the number of confirmed cells that have already been used to update other cells.
        Returns:
        the count

      • onlyChoice

        private void onlyChoice()
        Traverses each row/column/grid to find if there exists a cell that has a candidate not possible anywhere else in that row/column/grid.

      • onlyChoicePicker

        private void onlyChoicePicker​(int i,
                              int[] cnt_c,
                              int x,
                              int j)
        Fixes a value of a cell to the candidate that only that cell has in its row/column/grid.
        Parameters:
        i - the starting row index
        cnt_c - the array of counters corresponding to all candidates
        x - the index in the counter array which has been found
        j - the starting column index

      • solveWithBacktrack

        private boolean solveWithBacktrack()
        Function to solve the Sudoku grid; uses backtracking iff regular constraint propagation techniques are inadequate to find the solution.
        Returns:
        false if sudoku enters an invalid state; true if solved.

      • restoreValues

        private void restoreValues​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer>>> cellSetsSaved,
                           boolean[][] flagSaved)

      • makeAGuess

        private boolean makeAGuess​(int type)
        Function that makes a guess in a cell that has only two possible values.
        Parameters:
        type - signifies whether a guess has already been made or not
        Returns:
        false if the sudoku runs into an invalid state; true if not.

      • guessMaker

        private void guessMaker​(int l,
                        int r,
                        int i,
                        int j)
        Helper function to makeAGuess; created to avoid code duplication.
        Parameters:
        l - start of the substring
        r - end of the substring
        i - row index of the cell
        j - column index of the cell

      • initialiseSet

        private void initialiseSet​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer>>> cellSetsSaved)
        Initialises sets.
        Parameters:
        cellSetsSaved - the list of lists of sets to be initialised

      • solve

        private void solve()
        Loops between eliminating choices from confirmed cells and filling in only choice as long as it can.

      • checkIfFalse

        private boolean checkIfFalse()
        Checks if the current state of the sudoku is invalid.
        Returns:
        true if the state is invalid

      • checkIfEnough

        private boolean checkIfEnough()
        Checks if number of entries is at least 16.
        Returns:
        true if number of entries greater than or equal to 16

      • valueCounter

        private void valueCounter​(int i,
                          int[] cnt_r,
                          int[] cnt_c)
        Counts the instances of all possible numbers in the range.
        Parameters:
        i - the row/column index
        cnt_r - the counter array for a row
        cnt_c - the counter array for a column

      • gridValueCounter

        private void gridValueCounter​(int[] cnt,
                              int i1,
                              int j1)
        Counts the instances of all possible numbers in the grid.
        Parameters:
        cnt - the counter array
        i1 - starting row location of the grid
        j1 - starting column location of the grid

        private void resetFlags()
        Resets all flags
